text: Autosomal dominant inheritance - Brain stem compression - Flared metaphysis - Generalized joint laxity - Hypoplasia of midface - Infantile muscular hypotonia - Limited elbow extension - Limited hip extension - Lumbar hyperlordosis - Lumbar kyphosis in infancy - Megalencephaly - Motor delay - Neonatal short-limb short stature - Recurrent otitis media - Rhizomelia - Short femoral neck - Small foramen magnum - Spinal stenosis with reduced interpedicular distance - Trident hand - Upper airway obstru
